TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ImmutableArray extends System.Object
public ref class ImmutableArray abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供建立不可變陣列的方法；也就是說，一旦建立之後，便無法變更。

span.span: Provides methods for creating an array that is immutable; meaning it cannot be changed once it is created.

summary.span: **NuGet 套件**：System.Collections.Immutable (關於固定集合及其安裝方法)

span.span: **NuGet package**: System.Collections.Immutable (about immutable collections and how to install)

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

static member BinarySearch : System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray<'T> * 'T -> int

typeparam.span: 陣列中儲存之項目的型別。

span.span: The type of element stored in the array.

param.name: array
param.span: 要搜尋的已排序陣列。

span.span: The sorted array to search.

param.name: value
param.span: 要搜尋的物件。

span.span: The object to search for.

summary.span: 使用預設的比較子搜尋指定項目已排序的不可變陣列，並在找到時，傳回該項目以零為起始的索引。

span.span: Searches the sorted immutable array for a specified element using the default comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element, if it's found.

returns.span: 如果有找到項目，則為陣列中項目之以零為起始的索引，否則便為負數，此負數為大於 的下一個項目索引之位元補數，或者，如果沒有更大的項目，則為 的位元補數。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the array, if item is found; otherwise, a negative number that is the bitwise complement of the index of the next element that is larger than or, if there is no larger element, the bitwise complement of .

exception.span: 不實作 ，或搜尋遇到不實作 的項目。

span.span: does not implement or the search encounters an element that does not implement .

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 陣列中儲存之項目的型別。

span.span: The type of elements stored in the array.

param.name: items
param.span: 物件的來源陣列。

span.span: The source array of objects.

param.name: start
param.span: 要從 複製之第一個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of the first element to copy from .

param.name: length
param.span: 要包含在此不可變陣列中之 的項目數。

span.span: The number of elements from to include in this immutable array.

summary.span: 使用指定的物件，從某個不可變的陣列建立另一個不可變的陣列。

span.span: Creates an immutable array with the specified objects from another immutable array.

returns.span: 不可變的陣列，其中包含來源陣列中指定的物件。

span.span: An immutable array that contains the specified objects from the source array.

remarks.format: 這個多載可讓協助程式方法或自訂產生器類別，以有效率地避免 支付備援的稅務時新的陣列是現有陣列的區段，複製陣列。This overload allows helper methods or custom builder classes to efficiently avoid paying a redundant tax for copying an array when the new array is a segment of an existing array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載可讓您有效率地建立的根據現有、 對應的函式套用至每個項目來源陣列中的何處。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載可讓您有效率地建立的根據配量的現有、 對應的函式套用至每個項目包含在產生的陣列中的來源陣列中的何處。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on a slice of an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array included in the resulting array.
